title: Goal: Entity-Centric -> Event-Centric

definitions.State-of-the-art Captioner: An advanced system for generating captions for images.
definitions.Entity-centric: A method of focusing on the entities within an image.
definitions.Event-centric: A method of focusing on the events or actions within an image.

summary: The slide presents a goal to shift from an entity-centric to an event-centric approach in image captioning. It includes a definition of a state-of-the-art captioner and a diagram illustrating the transition from entity-centric to event-centric methods. The slide also features a photograph of a protest, with a captioner example and a diagram showing the entities and events in the image.
